article_title: Israeli PM blocks hospital for sick Gaza children in Israel
sentence: The  current  conflict  began  following  the  7  October  attack,  which  saw  around  1,200  people  killed  and  251  taken  hostage.

article_title: Israeli PM blocks hospital for sick Gaza children in Israel
sentence: The  Hamas-run  health  ministry  says  at  least  38,848  people  have  so  far  been  killed  and  89,459  injured  in  Gaza.
